Section.Paragraph: The lexical .entries for German syntactic analysis are taken from the analysis dictionary which is combined with a system of inflection lists; an analysis of inflectional endings is embedded in the dictionary access. A word form entry contains word class information, morphological features and values, some semantic information and the name of the lexeme.
While the system is running, the lists of information and features are converted

For syntactic parsing an ATN-grammar is used to recognize nominal and prepositio ~ nal phrases, adverbials and verbs or verbal groups. A special embedded program analyzes the verb constituents. Homonymous morphological and word class features are disambiguated as far as possible throughout the parsing process.
